item.description:
Have you met a loved one who has died, or had your own near-death experience? What about glimpses of past lives? What other evidence of proof do you have that our physical existence is but one short segment in a grander journey of Soul?

Let's get together to discuss the possibilities. You are welcome to come and share, or just listen to the experiences of others. We try to offer a safe environment where people can share (and listen) from the heart, knowing they're not the only ones having unusual experiences.

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: Is There Life After Death?
